spec_data.Name: perl-Class-Adapter
spec_data.Description:
The Class::Adapter class is intended as an abstract base class for creating
any sort of class or object that follows the Adapter pattern.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:54:35 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl implementation of the "Adapter" Design Pattern
